comment.value: On the A45 from Stonebridge towards M42 entry slip from the M42 , expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to an entertainment event , between 5 pm and 7 pm, from 26 April 2013 to 27 April 2013. Link to Multimap: Unavailable Link to Streetmap: http://streetmap.co.uk/grid/419555,283014 Link to Disclaimer: http://www.highways.gov.uk/aboutus/2301.aspx
